deployment.author: N/A
deployment.message:
{"type":"deployment","sha":"0ba8c58188c0d1ed69bab02287733bff3dcb9bd7","repoName":"Naveenkumar-2007/Daibetes","actor":"Naveenkumar-2007","slotName":"production","commitMessage":"feat: Complete mobile-responsive redesign and IST timezone implementation

- Redesigned entire website with mobile-first approach
- Added responsive navigation with hamburger menu for mobile
- Implemented touch-friendly UI elements (48px minimum touch targets)
- Added zoom prevention for consistent mobile experience
- Created comprehensive mobile-first CSS (styles_mobile.css)
- Updated all HTML templates with responsive viewport settings
- Improved form layouts with responsive grid system
- Enhanced button and input styling for mobile devices

- Implemented IST (Indian Standard Time) timezone support
- Added pytz timezone configuration for Asia/Kolkata
- Updated all datetime.now() calls to use get_ist_now()
- Fixed report timestamps to show correct IST time
- Updated patient ID generation with IST timestamps
- Corrected all user creation/update timestamps

Responsive breakpoints:
- Mobile: <768px (single column, hamburger menu)
- Tablet: 768px-1023px (2-column layouts)
- Desktop: 1024p"}
